name: Mario's Poorly Explained Escapade Through an Awkwardly Designed Cavern
name_original: Mario's Poorly Explained Escapade Through an Awkwardly Designed Cavern
description:
After waking up, Mario has found himself in a massive and intricate cavern full of strange characters and enemies. What's worse, he has no memories or powers! Why is Mario in a cave? Where did all these people come from? Where's Luigi? Why can't he jump on enemies? Most of these questions will be answered with enough determination!

This game has 3 different endings. Try to find them all!

This game was made as a personal challenge: complete an entire story driven game in a week using characters suggested to me by my friends. After a lot of brain damage, this is the disaster that rose from the ashes. Hope you enjoy!
